name: Koopa, green
desc: A green koopa. It slowly walks along the ground, and will walk off ledges, safety be damned. If jumped on, it will hide in its shell for some time.

name: ...yellow
desc: A yellow koopa. It quickly walks along the ground, and will walk off ledges, safety be damned. If jumped on, it will hide in its shell for some time.

name: ...red
desc: A red koopa. It slowly walks along the ground, and will stay on ledges. If jumped on, it will hide in its shell for some time.

name: ...blue
desc: A blue koopa. It quickly walks along the ground, and will stay on ledges. If jumped on, it will hide in its shell for some time.

name: Koopa shell, green
desc: A green koopa shell.

name: ...yellow
desc: A yellow koopa shell.

name: ...red
desc: A red koopa shell.

name: ...blue
desc: A blue koopa shell.

name: Lame parakoopa, green
desc: A green parakoopa that can't fly. It slowly walks along the ground, and will walk off ledges, safety be damned. If jumped on, it will loose its wings and turn into a normal koopa. It jumps over sprites kicked at it if it is facing them.

name: ...yellow
desc: A yellow parakoopa that can't fly. It quickly walks along the ground, and will walk off ledges, safety be damned. If jumped on, it will loose its wings and turn into a normal koopa. It jumps over sprites kicked at it if it is facing them.

name: ...red
desc: A red parakoopa that can't fly. It quickly walks along the ground, and will stay on ledges. If jumped on, it will loose its wings and turn into a normal koopa. It jumps over sprites kicked at it if it is facing them.

name: ...blue
desc: A blue parakoopa that can't fly. It quickly walks along the ground, and will stay on ledges. If jumped on, it will loose its wings and turn into a normal koopa. It jumps over sprites kicked at it if it is facing them.

name: Vertical parakoopa, green
desc: A green parakoopa that slowly flies vertically, up 5.5 tiles and then back down. If jumped on, it will loose its wings and turn into a normal koopa..

name: ...yellow
desc: A yellow parakoopa that quickly flies vertically, up 5.5 tiles and then back down. If jumped on, it will loose its wings and turn into a normal koopa..

name: ...red
desc: A red parakoopa that slowly flies vertically, up 5.5 tiles and then back down. If jumped on, it will loose its wings and turn into a normal koopa..

name: ...blue
desc: A blue parakoopa that quickly flies vertically, up 5.5 tiles and then back down. If jumped on, it will loose its wings and turn into a normal koopa.

name: Horizontal parakoopa, green
desc: A green parakoopa that slowly flies horizontally, left 7 tiles and then back. If jumped on, it will loose its wings and turn into a normal koopa.

name: Horizontal parakoopa, yellow
desc: A yellow parakoopa that quickly flies horizontally, left 7 tiles and then back. If jumped on, it will loose its wings and turn into a normal koopa.

name: Horizontal parakoopa, red
desc: A red parakoopa that slowly flies horizontally, left 7 tiles and then back. If jumped on, it will loose its wings and turn into a normal koopa.

name: Horizontal parakoopa, blue
desc: A blue parakoopa that quickly flies horizontally, left 7 tiles and then back. If jumped on, it will loose its wings and turn into a normal koopa.
